The saliva around you did nothing to keep you there and down you slid till Marth's throat muscles were notified you were there. You yelped from the sudden clenching of your ankles together as the muscles pulled you down. Marth gagged for a second then gulped hard again, sending you practically all the way down. He had to gulp again to make your head and shoulders go in. After that all it was, was a long minuet down with the walls rubbing against you, pushing you down. Once your feet could wiggle in the air you gulped and yelled as the esophagus let you go into the stomach. The floor was plusher than you thought as you landed smoothly. Still though, you got up shakily and looked around, noticing that the slight lack of clothes Marth had on let a red light in. After getting steady the air around you shifted, like if you stood under a large vaccum and had on lead shoes. Faster than a blink you were cold thanks to the outside air hitting you.

Wait...outside air?

Marth took you out and after shaking your head of spit he spoke, "See, 'Pop'. Probably didn't even feel it..."

"You're right...I didn't." One last shake of your head got it spit free enough that it wasn't leaking into your face when you looked up.

"Now if you don't mind..." Marth opened up his other hand to you and it took a few seconds before your brain clicked to 'Give sword'. Which you did and he put it on the table next to you. "Now it's some time before we get to the potions room. Are you hungry?"
1521.title: Popping Joey

15211.content:
"Yes! I'm starving!"

"Okay, how do you feel about Bacon and eggs? That's all the kitchen makes for breakfast now-a-days..."

"Anything will do. Just get..." You grabbed Marth's shirt and shook. "FOOD!" He blinked then snickered. "Right, let me go or you'll be dangling from my shirt..." You let go and he put you on the dresser. "Now stay..."

"Woof, Woof..." He turned and exited out the door. Your stomach growled in hunger and a few minuets later Marth came in with a plate and cutlery. Once he put the plate down next to you, you launched at it and started attacking the eggs. "HEY! At least have some..." Marth looked at the fork and then back to you attacking the food. "Argh...they really need to make smaller cutlery." He put down the extra fork and knife and started to nudge you over so he could cut his half of the eggs. It took only 5 minutes after Marth started for both of you to clean the plate. He put the napkin on the plate to stop you from picking up crumbs. "You know you're going to be in there with food now..."

"Can't be as bad as puke..." Marth opened his hand and slowly you crawled onto it. He didn't waste any time as he put you in his mouth and gulped. Once in the stomach you landed on a pile of eggs and Marth tapped the wall to make sure you were okay. After you gave the 'okay' the room started to move hecticly. Once it stops all you think is could he at least warn you next time he has to get dressed? The movement slowed down to a sort of swaying; like if in a hammock and the wind is at the right speed or your friend started to push it. Needless to say, it was pretty soothing. After a while you felt your eyes get heavy and to dreamland you went.

Only to be woke up by a loud pounding noise. Startled you fumble untill you got upright and balanced. Once fully up you breathe in deeply and yell out, "WHAT!?" The air shifted again and soon you were on a table again.

"I can't find the potion, so i'm thinking it's shrunken so your size can find it. Do you think you're up to the task?"

"Yes I am. Don't treat me like a kid..." You grumble as you push away a bottle in your way. It takes a while but you...
15211.title: Edible landing

choices: Screw this! Just get Ike's help!
Wait it out. Let Marth get rid of Ike so you can get back to searching.
152112.content:
After about fifteen minutes of fruitless searching, the door to the storage room opened and Ike came in, looking for Marth.

"Marth? Are you in here?" Ike asked, looking around.

Marth, thinking fast and without much time, shoved you behind a group of bottles before turning back to Ike. "Yes? What is it Ike?"

Ike's eye fell on Marth and he walked over to him. "We need to start training again Marth. In case you forgot, we have a match against Ness and Lucas tomorrow."

Marth glanced back at where you were hiding and said, "Sure, I'll be there in a minute."

Ike folded his arms and said, "I'll wait. You've been acting weird since that kid appeared. Where did he get to anyway?"

Marth was starting to get nervous. He didn't know whether or not to trust Ike. It was true he knew magic, but could he be trusted with something like this? Meanwhile, you were getting fed up with hiding behind a bunch of bottles. You wanted to get back to normal already! What do you do?
152112.title: Complications

choices: Ike moves all the potions and finds you.
1521122.content:
Marth hmphed. "Ike, like I WAS going to tell you before you interupted me; The kid dissapeared to somewhere else." Ike raised an eyebrow. "So then...can you tell me why there's a bottle moving behind you?" Marth slightly jumped and you looked up at the bottle you were shivering next to. Quickly you moved away from it and the bottle stopped moving. Ike facepalmed and groaned, "Oy veh, we have rats in the potion room..." He sighed and coughed. "Well then Marth, if you would allow me to get it."

"No!...I mean, who knows if it's a servant's pet. I know you're going to kill it once you get it." Marth grabbed Ike's advancing hand. "Can you just let the servants get it?" Ike smirked. "Why Marth...I never knew you cared for something that makes a castle's grade drop." Marth growled. "No...I just don't want mouse blood on my armor..."

All while Marth stopped and distracted Ike you were racking your brain to find how the hell you're going to get out of this one. "I got it!" You about face and try to find a path through the bottles so even if Ike moved the bottles the only way he'd find you is if he emptied the crate. Back and forth you went till you found an opening and slowly creeped through it, wincing when one of the bottles moved.

"Let me get the damn mouse, Marth!"

"NO! Let the servants get it!"

You were moving quicker now and without noticing you bonked on the back wall of the potions box. Great, now you were far enough for Ike to give up if he started moving potions. Now all there was to wait, but would the bandanna boy actually find you before Marth get rid of him?

A/N: Can anyone reading this please not add on to this. Another author has an option of adding in a different world in his story so can you please use that?
1521122.title: The Forest Bottle Kingdom!

choices: You manage to get to the potion room.
15211222.content:
Flat against the wall you try to slower your breathing. What doesn't help is that now the bottles are moving. "IKE!"

"Oh just shut up and let me get it already princess..."

The bottles in front of you moved up and away and there was Ike's quizzical face.

"I thought you said he left Marth..." His hand reached out and you ducked under it. When you tried to dart away again he grabbed you and took you out of the box. "You better start explaining." Marth bit his lip and you tried to climb up Ike's arm to get down, or at least to Marth.

"I gave him the sleeping potion, aaaaannnnd, apperantly it shrinks normal people." Marth finished by pointing to you. "And now that you've found him again...we'll be..." Marth grabbed you out of Ike's hand and after getting a good hold, but not crushing, grip on you, "Leaving, ta-ta!" Marth sprinted out of the potions room and all you could hear was Marth's breathing. Suddenly the world lurched and all you could see was Marth's hands reducing in size. The floor reached you and once your head met it also you conked out.

When you woke up there was a sharp pain and you wanted to groan but someone bonked you on the head. "SHHHH!" You looked up and saw Marth, the same size as you. "Ike did this, he's looking for us. Just stay quiet and we'll get back to the potion room to get you fixed!"
15211222.title: The Finding, and the Traitor.

choices: Leave for the darkness again. Sorry Pit
Don't do anything! Stay out of trouble until Pit comes back.
153.content:
"If the only thing you two are going to do it fight, then forget it! I'll go alone!"

Both men just stare at you as you walk away in a huff, a bright light surrounding you once again as you appear back in the darkness. You walk past the castle symbol towards the next one. This one appeared to be a bow and arrow symbol. You shrug and touch it, wondering where this one was going to lead you. The light surrounds you once more and you find yourself in a dark castle like room. Looking out a nearby window you are shocked to see nothing but clouds as far as the eye could see! You appeared to be on a castle in the sky. As you stare in a awe, a voice shouts out from behind you, "Hey!"

You turn and see a young boy dressed in a white robe of some kind pointing an arrow at you! You hold up your hands and shout, "Wait! I'm not a bad guy! Don't shoot!"

The boy kept the arrow trained on you and said, "Who are you? How did you get here?"

"I just pressed an option called "Join the Game". There was a flash of light and I tried to go to this castle, but these two blue haired jerks kept arguing so I came here instead!"

The boy lowered the bow and said, "You know Marth and Ike?"

"Uh...I think that's what their names were, yeah." You reply.

The boy looked relieved and said, "I know those two as well. If you were a threat they would've taken care of you."

He walked up to you and offered his hand. "My name's Pit."

You shake his hand and offer your name as well. Then you ask, "So what is this place?"

Pit gestures around the room and said, "This is the Temple of Palutena, my goddess. She rules over Skyworld and I'm her loyal follower."

"Isn't there anyone else here?" You ask.

"Palutena doesn't appear often." Pit said. "And the centurions keep to themselves. It can get a little lonely actually."

You're starting to feel sorry for the guy. You decide to stay for awhile and keep him company. He smiles at you and says, "If you're planning on staying you should probably get some different clothes on. You'll stick out if you wear those."

You agree and Pit leads you to a room. It contained a bed, a desk, and a dresser, a mirror hanging over the dresser. It was a simple enough room and Pit said, "Take what you need out of the dresser. I'll come back in a few minutes, I've just got to go check something."

With that, he closes the door and leaves you to get dressed. You pull open the dresser and pull out the same outfit Pit was wearing. You strip out of your old clothes and put these on instead. They were smooth and airy, allowing for a lot of free movement. Since Pit hadn't come back yet, you decided to look around for awhile. Pulling open the desk drawer you find two things. One, is a badge with the bow and arrow emblem reversed. You assume this will take you back into the darkness to find a different area to visit. The other item is a bottle of some kind. You open it and sniff it. It smells nice, and you're feeling rather thirsty. So, what do you want to do?
153.title: Castle in the Sky

choices: Go through the door (To ness or Lucas' worlds)
You have second thoughts and go back to pit
1532.content: You decide to go to a different area. Sure pit is fun and all but with pit having all those duties of protecting humans, battling Hades, Medusa, Veridi, etc. you'd just get in the way. You make up your mind as you grab the badge and a light engulfs you When it clears you find yourself in darkness facing a door labeled "Earthbound universe" you then look down at your self and see that your back in your old clothes and not the ones Pit gave you "My outfit must change back when I leave a world to go find somewhere else." you think to yourself, You then look back at the door and find it still waiting for your choice. You now must chose: Go through the door or find somewhere else? The decision is yours..
1532.title: Earthbound universe?

info.brief_description: Taking you, the reader, on a hell of a trip!
info.description:
It's March 9th, and you're stoked. Smash Bros. Brawl was just released, and you just put it in. The music is loud, the colors are flying, and the main title appears! Upon looking through the main screen, you see a strange option, the option of "Join the game". You click this option, curious as to it's purpose. A bright light flashes from the screen, and you cover your eyes, unable to avoid the inevitable blackout.


You awaken in a daze, looking around you, to see a strange door, labeled with words you can barely make out.


Will you survive?
